hits.title: Function-Calling and Data Extraction with LLMs
hits.description: Learn to apply function-calling to expand LLM and agent application capabilities.
hits.prerequisites: Familiarity with LLMs and basic Python knowledge are recommended.

title.value: Function-Calling and Data Extraction with LLMs

description.value: Learn to apply function-calling to expand LLM and agent application capabilities.

hits.title: Building Your Own Database Agent
hits.description: Interact with tabular data and SQL databases using natural language, enabling more efficient and accessible data analysis.
hits.prerequisites: If you want to learn how to interact with databases through natural language, this beginner-friendly course is for you. Familiarity with Python programming and databases (CSV files and SQL) is recommended, but not required.

description.value: Interact with tabular data and SQL databases using natural language, enabling more efficient and accessible data analysis.

hits.title: AI Agents in LangGraph
hits.description: Build agentic AI workflows using LangChain's LangGraph and Tavily's agentic search.
hits.prerequisites: If you have intermediate Python knowledge and want to learn how to create more controllable agents using the LangGraph open source framework, this course is for you.

description.value: Build agentic AI workflows using LangChain's LangGraph and Tavily's agentic search.

hits.title: AI Agentic Design Patterns with AutoGen
hits.description: Use the AutoGen framework to build multi-agent systems with diverse roles and capabilities for implementing complex AI applications.
hits.prerequisites: If you have basic Python coding experience and you’re interested in automating complex workflows using AI agents, this course will provide the practical skills and knowledge you need to leverage AutoGen effectively.

title.value: AI Agentic Design Patterns with AutoGen

description.value: Use the AutoGen framework to build multi-agent systems with diverse roles and capabilities for implementing complex AI applications.

hits.title: Introduction to On-Device AI
hits.description: Deploy AI for edge devices and smartphones. Learn model conversion, quantization, and how to modify for deployment on diverse devices.
hits.prerequisites: Familiarity with Python, as well as PyTorch or TensorFlow is recommended.

description.value: Deploy AI for edge devices and smartphones. Learn model conversion, quantization, and how to modify for deployment on diverse devices.

hits.title: Multi AI Agent Systems with crewAI
hits.description: Automate business workflows with multi-AI agent systems. Exceed the performance of prompting a single LLM by designing and prompting a team of AI agents through natural language.
hits.prerequisites: If you've taken some prompt engineering courses, have some familiarity with basic coding, and want to incorporate LLMs in your professional work, then this course is designed for you!

title.value: Multi AI Agent Systems with crewAI

description.value: Automate business workflows with multi-AI agent systems. Exceed the performance of prompting a single LLM by designing and prompting a team of AI agents through natural language.

hits.title: Building Multimodal Search and RAG
hits.description: Build smarter search and RAG applications for multimodal retrieval and generation.

description.value: Build smarter search and RAG applications for multimodal retrieval and generation.

hits.title: Building Agentic RAG with LlamaIndex
hits.description: Build autonomous agents that intelligently navigate and analyze your data. Learn to develop agentic RAG systems using LlamaIndex, enabling powerful document Q&A and summarization. Gain valuable skills in guiding agent reasoning and debugging.

description.value: Build autonomous agents that intelligently navigate and analyze your data. Learn to develop agentic RAG systems using LlamaIndex, enabling powerful document Q&A and summarization. Gain valuable skills in guiding agent reasoning and debugging.

hits.title: Machine Learning in Production
hits.description: Design an ML production system: scoping, data, modeling, deployment. Prototype development, deployment & continuous improvement.

description.value: Design an ML production system: scoping, data, modeling, deployment. Prototype development, deployment & continuous improvement.

hits.title: Quantization in Depth
hits.description: Customize model compression with advanced quantization techniques. Try out different variants of Linear Quantization, including symmetric vs. asymmetric mode, and different granularities.
hits.prerequisites: This course builds on the concepts introduced in the Quantization Fundamentals course. Taking it before Quantization in Depth is recommended.

description.value: Customize model compression with advanced quantization techniques. Try out different variants of Linear Quantization, including symmetric vs. asymmetric mode, and different granularities.

hits.title: Prompt Engineering for Vision Models
hits.description: Learn prompt engineering for vision models using Stable Diffusion, and advanced techniques like object detection and in-painting.
hits.instructors: Abby Morgan, Jacques Verré, Caleb Kaiser
hits.prerequisites: Prompt Engineering for Vision Models is a hands-on course that helps you get started with prompting vision models. Python experience is recommended.

description.value: Learn prompt engineering for vision models using Stable Diffusion, and advanced techniques like object detection and in-painting.

hits.title: Getting Started With Mistral
hits.description: Explore Mistral's open-source and commercial models, and leverage Mistral's JSON mode to generate structured LLM responses. Use Mistral's API to call user-defined functions for enhanced LLM capabilities.
hits.prerequisites: Getting Started with Mistral is a beginner-friendly course and it’s suitable for anyone who wants to learn about and use Mistral AI's collection of advanced open source and commercial LLMs.

description.value: Explore Mistral's open-source and commercial models, and leverage Mistral's JSON mode to generate structured LLM responses. Use Mistral's API to call user-defined functions for enhanced LLM capabilities.

hits.title: Quantization Fundamentals with Hugging Face
hits.description: Learn how to quantize any open-source model. Learn to compress models with the Hugging Face Transformers library and the Quanto library.
hits.prerequisites: Learn how to quantize any open source model.

description.value: Learn how to quantize any open-source model. Learn to compress models with the Hugging Face Transformers library and the Quanto library.

hits.title: Preprocessing Unstructured Data for LLM Applications
hits.description: Improve your RAG system to retrieve diverse data types. Learn to extract and normalize content from a wide variety of document types, such as PDFs, PowerPoints, and HTML files.
hits.prerequisites: Improve your RAG system to retrieve diverse data formats

title.value: Preprocessing Unstructured Data for LLM Applications

description.value: Improve your RAG system to retrieve diverse data types. Learn to extract and normalize content from a wide variety of document types, such as PDFs, PowerPoints, and HTML files.

hits.title: Red Teaming LLM Applications
hits.description: Learn how to make safer LLM apps through red teaming. Learn to identify and evaluate vulnerabilities in large language model (LLM) applications.
hits.prerequisites: This is a beginner-friendly course. Basic Python knowledge is recommended to get the most out of this course.

description.value: Learn how to make safer LLM apps through red teaming. Learn to identify and evaluate vulnerabilities in large language model (LLM) applications.

hits.title: JavaScript RAG Web Apps with LlamaIndex
hits.description: Build a full-stack web application that uses RAG capabilities to chat with your data. Learn to build a RAG application in JavaScript, using an intelligent agent to answer queries.

title.value: JavaScript RAG Web Apps with LlamaIndex

description.value: Build a full-stack web application that uses RAG capabilities to chat with your data. Learn to build a RAG application in JavaScript, using an intelligent agent to answer queries.

hits.title: Efficiently Serving LLMs
hits.description: Understand how LLMs predict the next token and how techniques like KV caching can speed up text generation. Write code to serve LLM applications efficiently to multiple users.

description.value: Understand how LLMs predict the next token and how techniques like KV caching can speed up text generation. Write code to serve LLM applications efficiently to multiple users.

hits.title: Knowledge Graphs for RAG
hits.description: Learn how to build and use knowledge graph systems to improve your retrieval augmented generation applications. Use Neo4j's query language Cypher to manage and retrieve data.
hits.prerequisites: We recommend familiarity with LangChain or taking the short course "LangChain: Chat with Your Data" prior to this course.

description.value: Learn how to build and use knowledge graph systems to improve your retrieval augmented generation applications. Use Neo4j's query language Cypher to manage and retrieve data.

hits.title: Open Source Models with Hugging Face
hits.description: Learn how to easily build AI applications using open-source models and Hugging Face tools. Find and filter open-source models on Hugging Face Hub.
hits.instructors: Maria Khalusova, Marc Sun, Younes Belkada

title.value: Open Source Models with Hugging Face

description.value: Learn how to easily build AI applications using open-source models and Hugging Face tools. Find and filter open-source models on Hugging Face Hub.

hits.title: Prompt Engineering with Llama 2 & 3
hits.description: Learn best practices for prompting and selecting among Meta Llama 2 & 3 models. Interact with Meta Llama 2 Chat, Code Llama, and Llama Guard models.

description.value: Learn best practices for prompting and selecting among Meta Llama 2 & 3 models. Interact with Meta Llama 2 Chat, Code Llama, and Llama Guard models.
